A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Miserable. A cynical\, clueless travesty. The only force that awakened this drivel was smug incompetence. The level of malpractice on display from the start of this phony trilogy-reboot should involve jail time. Phooey on Kennedy\, Kasdan\, Abrams\, Johnson and their hive of corporate larvae. \n\nOn the other hand\, the sound effects were quite good.
